ISSUE.TITLE: DeleteDirectory should be virtual method
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Please replace public void DeleteDirectory(string path) with public virtual void DeleteDirectory(string path) https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/blob/12dd4825dfb56bbc64e192cd35d25e3205427646/src/Libraries/Nop.Core/Infrastructure/NopFileProvider.cs#L117

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #6328 Added the virtual keyword for DeleteDirectory and GetFileInfo methods in NopFileProvider
